start.dialogue: Dude, I love playing Fortnite! I've been playing since day 1, even got the skull trooper skin!

options.trigger: Skull Trooper, more like Dull Trooper. Am I right?

dont_fortnite.dialogue: Man, you totally should! I know Reddit says it's lame but don't listen to them, they don't know what true epicness is.

options.trigger: No, I don't think I will
I guess I could give it a shot.

me_too_fortnite.dialogue: Dude, let's play some right fricken now

dull_trooper.dialogue: Man, that's fricked up and actually just objectively wrong. See, for instance, Skulls are pretty based. Now troopers are a bit cringe, but it still is a net based rating. So apply that to the skin, volia:  Based Skin

tl:dr.dialogue:
Basically, I'm based and epic, and your'e cringe.
So sugma. . .

mid_sentence_ending.dialogue:
*You get up and leave*
Wait! Where are you going?! Hello?! I know you can hear me . . .

whats_sugma_ending.dialogue:
Ha ha ha. You've activated my trap card!
*You just fucking explode. The last thing you hear is 'Sugma nuts.'*

no_u_ending.dialogue:
No, wait! That's im-impossible!! Argh! If it wern't for you meddling ki-
*You shoot him in the head before he finishes his sentence.*

fortnite_ending.dialogue: Ok, i'll go get us some drinks. Oh, by the way, my Mom's making some grilled cheese, want some?

thats_ok.dialogue: That's ok, what else do you wanna play?

nomeggies.dialogue: Oh, yeah? Well, see if I care, cause I don't. Yes, on god, I don't. Whatever I don't need you, I'll go play by myself . . .

minecraft_ending.dialogue: Oh, that reminds me. I just set up a Minecraft server. Here i'll give you the IP. You brought your laptop right? . . .

fall_guys_ending.dialogue: Here, I got it on my PS4, I'll go grab the second controller from my brother . . .

*_ending.dialogue: I got this new game called Undertale. I think we should give it a go, but it is a singleplayer game. Here, how about this: I voice all the male characters, and you voice all the girl characters. Get it, cause you're a girl. Wait you are a girl, right? Wait wait, no, WAIT . . .

among_us_ending.dialogue:
STOP POSTING ABOUT AMONG US! I'M TIRED OF SEEING IT MY FRIENDS ON TIKTOK SEND ME MEMES, ON DISCORD IT'S FUCKING MEMES. I was in a server, right, and ALL OF THE CHANNELS ARE JUST AMONG US STUFF. I- I showed my Champion underwear to my girlfriend and the logo, I flipped it, 'Hey Babe, when the underwear sus!' HAHA. DING DING DING DING DING DING DING, DING-DING-DING. I fucking looked at a trash can and I said, 'That's a bit sussy.' I look at my penis, I think of the astronauts helmet and I GO PENIS!? MORE LIKE PEN-SUS AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA  . . . 
*You were ejected*
